mapper.insert: insert into deliveryreceipt (deliveryReceiptId, startCity, endCity, midCity, makeDate, State, Comment) values (#{deliveryreceiptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update deliveryreceipt set startCity = #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endCity = #{endcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midCity = #{midcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, makeDate = #{makedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, State = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where deliveryReceiptId = #{deliveryreceiptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select deliveryReceiptId, startCity, endCity, midCity, makeDate, State, Comment from deliveryreceipt
